title: Language development in multicultural classroom: science
creator_contributor_role: Sydney College of Advanced Education, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Study and teaching - Foreign speakers
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Science - Study and teaching
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Science - Study and teaching
description: Focuses on how to develop specific language related to science for English as a second Language students. It shows how grade 3 and 4 explored a theme around a unit on Space, providing the viewers with both strategies and practical ideas.
